title: Bande-annonce de 'Mouchette'
overview: Godard presents a trailer for the iconic classic Mouchette (1967), one of the most important films made by Robert Bresson. The short created by Godard brings most of his own personal and known characteristics with the use of clips from the film followed with texts that reveal a little about the picture, some minor words from the scenes in between.
